attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Manhunt 2 has been banned by the BBFC on all console formats it was meant to be released for, an adult game for adults.

Why in 2007 are we still living in the Dark Ages under a dictatorship to say what Adults can and can’t play?

There is no link to ‘Computer Game Violence’ and ‘Real Life Violence’ the BBFC has even said this to some extend themselves on recent reports.

We need to fight back against this rubbish before every game is cut, banned, or censored.

This is one step too far, gamers unite and make them start treating us like adults.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
